properties.title: Bockmattlihütte
properties.description: The Bockmattli climbing hut is a simple accommodation and is maintained from mid-April to the end of October on weekends. The hut is closed from Monday to Friday. Otherwise - if the flag is outside, someone is inside.
properties.city: Central Switzerland, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
properties.place: Central Switzerland, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
